text: Lushnjë is a city in central Albania. It is in the Fier County. 83,659 people lived here at the 2011 census. It has a total area of . It has many schools. In January 1920, Lushnjë was a temporary capital of Albania and the place of the Congress of Lushnjë. == References == Category:Cities in Albania Category:Fier County
title: Lushnjë
